title: [testing] Account Synchroization
body: Trying to synchronize account, don't mind me.

replies.body: With automatic account syncing a thing, posting and commenting to sync your account are now a thing of the past! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Bazerka,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=VaRFg9zq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-07-06T23:51:16.982+0000)
>
> Did it work? o.o

Kind of?
https://i.imgur.com/N7EDCXa.jpg

So as you see the system thinks my account is level 5, but it believes I'm at least level 7 for posting purposes, but the account itself is actually level 21.
